ANU.biography: Roger Hillman is an Emeritus Fellow in the School of Languages, Literature and Linguistics. He is an Alexander von Humboldt Fellow (German Govt. postdoctoral award) and a Fellow of the Australian Academy of Humanities. In 2014 and 2016 he was an Arts and Humanities assessor for the European Research Council.
